name: gasless-notes-app
description: Gasless Notes App using Firebase + ERC-4337 Account Abstraction

scripts.paymaster:balance: cd backend && node -e "const {ethers} = require('ethers'); const provider = new ethers.providers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.RPC_URL || 'https://eth-sepolia.g.alchemy.com/v2/YH8ErTqInvcMQ4ZkvCzSMVXee0aAg8LG'); const entryPoint = new ethers.Contract('0x5FF137D4b0FDCD49DcA30c7CF57E578a026d2789', ['function balanceOf(address) view returns (uint256)'], provider); entryPoint.balanceOf('0x9D18bDD3E47990e4da201936A1433dB8eB53DA3b').then(b => console.log('ðŸ’° Paymaster Balance:', ethers.utils.formatEther(b), 'ETH'));"
